DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Transversus abdominis plane block as part of a multimodal postoperative regimen is superior to control in analgesic efficacy after laparoscopic cholecystectomy.
DOC.brief_title: The Analgesic Efficacy of Transversus Abdominis Plane Block After Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy
DOC.criteria: Laparoscopic cholecystectomy ASA 13 BMI 1835 Written consent Do not understand danish Drug allergy Pregnancy Alcohol or drug abuse Chronic pain with consumption of opioids Consumption of NSAID, COX2inhibitors or paracetamol within 24 hours before the investigation Infection at the needle site.
DOC.keyword: Transversus abdominis plane block, postoperative pain.
